description: Manage service identities of a VM.

commands.name: az vm identity assign
commands.summary: Enable managed service identity on a VM.
examples: az vm identity assign -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm --role Reader --scope /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup
az vm identity assign -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm --role Reader --identities [system] myAssignedId --scope /subscriptions/00000000-0000-0000-0000-000000000000/resourceGroups/MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az vm identity remove
commands.summary: Remove managed service identities from a VM.
examples: az vm identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm
az vm identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm --identities readerId
az vm identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm --identities readerId writerId
az vm identity remove -g MyResourceGroup -n MyVm --identities [system] readerId

commands.name: az vm identity show
examples: az vm identity show --name MyVirtualMachine --resource-group MyResourceGroup
